title: Game Dev Tycoon v1.4.4 (2-click run)
description:

If everybody seeds, you will get higher downloading speeds.

DESCRIPTION:
Game Dev Tycoon is a business simulation game available for Windows and Mac as well as on the Windows 8 Store. In Game Dev Tycoon you replay the history of the gaming industry by starting your own video game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games. Research new technologies and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.
